title: Young film makers
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Eugene Schlusser
brief_description: A grade 6 class at Kananook Primary School show how they made a film. During a visit to ABC Channel 2 they learned about make-up, back drops and costumes. After long discussion the script was worked out, actors chosen, props and costumes made and locations chosen.
